the best dating sim i've ever played

I once had a dog. I loved that dog, I bonded with it, spent 100's of hours with it. We were inseparable.
One day it died. I grieved for it. My life was over, our time was spent.
Someone then gave me a cat instead. I hated that cat, I threw it out.
Much later, someone gave me another dog, a rescue. I didn't gel with it at first. It felt wrong, it felt like it was trying to replace my old golden dog. He was rough looking, needed lots of help. I couldn't deal with it, I gave it to my aunt.
Months later, I returned to see this dog, it looked much healthier, much funner to play with. I realised I missed have a dog, and this dog was actually a gem, I just never gave it a chance when it was rough looking.
I now love this dog and we spend all our time together.

Sinking plenty of hours into Dead by Daylight for years has had it's frustrating and satisfying moments. The development team has created a fun and active community over the years and even through it's rough patches has always successfully created an enjoyable experience. If you're willing to get past it's bit of a steep learning curve Dead by Daylight will give you an enjoyable game for a decent price.

Overall a pretty fun game. The online community can be problematic at times, and there are definitely issues with how Behavior has the game in its current state, but the game itself is enjoyable as a 1v4 asymmetric horror game. It's more fun when you play with people, but arguably it changes the balance of the game. It takes practice to get a good grasp of the mechanics as both a survivor or a killer.

I'd recommend it as a game to play with others or if you enjoy playing the more powerful role.
Spoopy

This game is so broken. Been stuck in Rank 15 all day with nothing but killers that tunnel and camp and get rewarded for it so they do it OVER and OVER again. Ghostface has the abilities of 3 killers combined, maybe try balancing him before you release him next time devs. Rating system is broken. There's no point other than to make the player feels better because I promise you that devs don't read them. I love the concept and really want this game to work, but with the toxicity of the community that surrounds this game, its really, really hard and that environment is only in place because of the Devs.

Honestly, fix your game.
